name: Crystal Memories
description:
A puzzle adventure Rpg-Maker game breaking the 4th wall and interacting with you!

 

A young girl, which suddenly gets taken away by some stranger suddenly ends up making a deal with him.

What will happen to her and how did she end up in such a situation?  Join Suzume on her adventure and find it out now!


Gameplay

The main focus lies on the two main Characters Suzume and Jackson which make a deal to help each other out, but beyond that there lays way more than Suzume would have ever expected.  Finding out about her own and his past and deepening their bond on this adventure while she learns why Jackson is doing this all for her and why he even searched for her.

The game doesn't involve a fighting system and is only story based, making you feel with the characters and learning about their story. It contains some puzzles and quizzes which you must solve to help the two to escape and make it out alive, because even though there is no fighting system there are still times where your characters can die.
Try not to kill them while playing!

Controls

Arrow Keys: To move the Character
Esc: Open the Menu
Enter: Confirm

Progress can be saved and reloaded in the menu.

Info

Crystal Memories is a puzzle Rpg Game made by using Rpg Maker MV.
The game is not finished yet and still in a very early alpha version. I am trying my best to continue working on it, but please stay patient as I am in my last year of highschool and I can not always work on the game.
Please tell me about any errors, bugs or anything else you find while playing the game. I always apperciate the help and the feedback!

Thanks for playing!
